title: Commission Decision of 26 July 1988 on the improvement of the efficiency of agricultual structures in the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 July 1988
on the improvement of the efficiency of agricultual structures in the United Kingdom pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the English text is authentic)
(88/471/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions adopted to implement Title III of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 in the United Kingdom, having regard to the provisions notified, continue to satisfy the conditions for a financial contribution by the Community to the common measure referred to in Article 1 of the said Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
